text.language: Am/n: all/louia Doxa Patri ke Uiw ke a~giw Pneumati:
Amen. Alleluia. Glory to the Father and to the Son and to the Holy Spirit.

language.div: Amin Aleluia, Kemuliaan kepada Bapa dan Putra dan Roh Kudus

text.language: امين هلليلويا المجد للاب والابن والروح القدس.
Tenws e~bol enjw m~moc: je w~ Pen[oic I/couc Pi,~rictoc.
We proclaim and say, O our Lord Jesus Christ,
Kami menyatakan: "Ya Tuhan kami Yesus Kristus,
نصرخ قائلين يا ربنا يسوع المسيح
